description._content: Image taken from: Title: "À bord de la Junon ... Ouvrage illustré de cent cinquante dessins ... par H. M. Scott, G. de Saint Clair, etc" Author: LEMAY, Gaston. Contributor: SAINT-CLAIR-STEVENSON, G. de. Contributor: SCOTT, Henry - Artist Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10026.l.8." Page: 357 Place of Publishing: Paris Date of Publishing: 1881 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002126805 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
